title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.18 - Vehicles to be equipped with mirror
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.18 - Vehicles to be equipped with mirror

State Regulations

Every automotive vehicle shall be equipped with at
least one mirror, so adjusted that the operator of such vehicle shall have a
clear view of the road behind such vehicle for a distance of 200
feet. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
